short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Internet Clicker for Google Slides Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internet clicker allows presenters to remote control Google Slides from anywhere just using a web browser. The presenter can also see their notes and slide preview on the controller.
